ygData.subject: deploying on weblogic/tomcat
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.. If i explicitly removes the Extension lists from the MANIFEST.MF in heritrix.jar it works fine. Is there any nice way of handling this without modifying

Hmm.. If i explicitly removes the Extension lists from the MANIFEST.MF
in h=
eritrix.jar it works fine. Is there any nice way of 
handling this without =
modifying the jar file?


But i am not able to login . i thought the heritr=
ix.properties file [
where i specified the login/passwd] is not being picke=
d up from the
conf directory..  When i went thru the code only for command =
line
initialization we read the login/password from heritrix.properties
fil=
e. i think i need to give the authentication in the web.xml of my
applicati=
on.
